description.value: This tube holds milky liquid with a strong alcohol smell. When found, a tube contains 1d6 + 1 ounces. You can take a Utilize|XPHB action to pour 1 or more ounces of solvent from the tube onto a surface within reach. Each ounce instantly dissolves up to 1 square foot of adhesive it touches, including Sovereign Glue.

_srdData.name: Universal Solvent
entries: This tube holds milky liquid with a strong alcohol smell. When found, a tube contains {@dice 1d6 + 1} ounces.

You can take a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action to pour 1 or more ounces of solvent from the tube onto a surface within reach. Each ounce instantly dissolves up to 1 square foot of adhesive it touches, including Sovereign Glue.
